name: The Lisper
description:
We already confirmed that our attackers are from the planet OOP. Most people think we have to attack right now because our enemy is just starting their tactical operations but we are pretty sure that more knowledge is required in order to start an attack. One part of your mission is the gathering of a few pieces of mineral used by these mo....ers presumably used as a vital resource. In addition, we have to kill a bunch of these aliens to show some of our artillery power. Be with the monadic forces liutenant!

Instructions
- Use SPACE to accelerate The Lisper.

 - LEFT and RIGHT keys to rotate The Lisper.

- DOWN key to examine objectives and ENTER key plant a mine.

Credits

SketchyLogic - Music from OGA

Ansimuz - Tiles from Itch
